title: Fractionalized Investing
description: There is limited ability for investing with Cardano Ada.

f6_assessments.q0: I would like the proposal to demonstrate how NFTs will fit into the business model. The problem statement and solution must be further refined, the problem statement is broad at the moment and can be condensed to address a specific investment problem. I would like to see the solution explain the NFT use case so I can understand the business model. I would like the proposal to expand on the value delivered to the cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The idea is good however the proposal requires further development. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". Furthermore, the project must develop the budget and breakdown the budget into identifiable items. Lastly, the project will require additional funding, the team must clarify how the project will fund itself in future
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal lacks a roadmap and provided a single line budget. I would like to see the team develop and define Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project – what does success look like in 12 months, what value of investing do you want on the platform by month 6 – set a goal and use it as a KPI.  Furthermore, I would like to see the team create a solid roadmap -  develop and add milestones to provide deeper detail, set technical development milestones for creating the product. Lastly, the budget needs to be developed beyond a single line entry, the team must create a detailed breakdown. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be difficult to audit.
